text: Mika-Matti "Mixu" Paatelainen (born 3 February 1967 in Helsinki) is a retired Finnish football player and is the current manager of Hibernian. Mixu is the oldest of three brothers, all of whom have played professional football. He scored 18 goals in 70 appearances for the Finnish national team, which makes him Finland's all time twelfth most capped player and fifth top goalscorer. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competitionRothmans Football Yearbooks and Sky Sports Yearbooks 1988–2011Jalkapallokirja 2008.
